MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Davis Township Project in North America dated April 2000

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Davis Township Project in North America dated April 2000
document.description: This report by Minera Capital Corporation details geological and exploration activities at Davis Township property, emphasizing low-grade copper and nickel mineralization with potential for platinum group metals and gold.
